thread.section_title: Lovehoney Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.lovehoney.co.uk | 134 of 2047
thread.title: Beverley Arthurs

author: Beverley Arthurs
title: Beverley Arthurs
text: I have purchased a couple of items from Lovehoney and I must say I have been totally pleased with the purchases and the Customer Services response when I lost my charger; I had the charger replaced free of charge by Lovehoney which was a real surprise as I was completely prepared to pay for a replacement. Would not hesitate to buy from them again!
